title: N172 OJ Hellman - Sioux City - SOLD -

posts.post_title: N172 OJ Hellman - Sioux City - SOLD -
posts.post_content:
N172 Old Judge Tony Hellman - Sioux City  - SOLD -

Email to [url]jeremyj70@comcast.net[/url]

One of the best images on a OJ you will find.  Technical grade is due to glue spots from removal from a scrap book on the reverse. The Front is crystal clear and free of any creases or residue.  Super Crisp OJ image !
Jeremy, I'll take it.  email sent.
Just out of curiosity, what was the sale price?
Did you have a price posted,when you listed card?
